content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest, Max Müller. I am sure you will find the apartment to your liking. How much are you willing to pay for this prime location in the city center?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's start with 500 euros per month. It's a fair price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Max Müller, but 500 euros per month is not nearly enough for such a prime location. The apartment is brand new and in the heart of the city, close to all amenities. I'm looking for a tenant who can appreciate the value of this property. How about 700 euros per month? It's a more reasonable offer, considering the quality and location of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a big difference. Let's meet halfway. I offer 600 euros. This is a fair price for an unfurnished apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hmm, 600 euros is closer to what I'm looking for, but I'm afraid it's still not enough. The demand for apartments in the city center is high, and I need a tenant who can afford to pay a premium. How about 650 euros per month? This is a good deal for you, considering the convenience and the newness of the building.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your reasoning, but 650 euros is still a lot of money for an unfurnished apartment. I offer 625 euros as a compromise.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, you are a persistent negotiator. However, I must insist on 650 euros per month. This is the lowest I can go for such a prime location. The apartment is brand new, and you will be enjoying all the benefits of living in the city center. I believe 650 euros is a fair price for both parties. What do you say? Can we agree on this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 650 euros per month!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm glad to hear that, Max Müller. You have made a wise decision. The apartment is indeed a great investment for your living situation. We will proceed with the rental agreement at 650 euros per month. Is there anything else we need to discuss before we finalize the contract?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
No, I don't think there's anything else to discuss. I'm looking forward to moving into the new apartment. Thank you for your time and cooperation, Mister Schmidt.

[response]
Thank you, Max Müller. I appreciate your professionalism and persistence during our negotiation. I am confident you will be a great tenant. I will prepare the rental agreement for us to sign. Looking forward to a successful tenancy. Have a great day!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'm sure we will have a successful tenancy. I'm looking forward to moving in soon. Have a great day as well!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
